title: We need to be harsher on people who say "I'm feeding" or similar statements
body:
Why should we give any chances to a player who will willingly run into the fed enemy with no intent of surviving due to some petty shit like me not ganking them? Why isn't that just a perma ban? There's no "it's a bad game" when they DECLARE they're going to intentionally feed. Give them no chances.

inb4 "that won't solve every feeder case" look we gotta stop shooting down ideas because "there may be something better", let's do this one step at a time.

replies.body: I agree that admission in chat should hold weight but there are those off chances it hits those people who are actually just playing poorly and are beating themselves up about it in chat and then how are we to determine whether they were or weren't?
You could just stop playing? Or they could ban you too. Those solve the "issue" just as well.
Ban me because I'm not gonna give into someones demands or else they'll intentionally feed? Here's a new idea, no.
Here's an idea, CRY HARDER BB.
Look if I cry any harder my glasses will get stained, OK? And I can't do that!

Because then we would have to ban every League player who tower dived the ai since we first started.

Alright anyway, I know the reason why and it was because you kept sucking your superfed midlaner off who has a terrible late game just like the enemy midlaner as well and left top lane to be clapped dry cheeks for literally 40 whole mins I'm seeing legit a 8k worth of gold and xp completely curbstomping the family jewels difference in top lane,  a jungler is suppose to make the right calls and get those late game carries there, your team is against 4 ad 1 ap tank sup and yet you build a {{item:3001}}  for your mid? or your sup and jg self with the beast that is a nightmare to all ad that scales off arm  all you had to do was tower dive  the  bot or top,  all day long,  and you woulda prob won the game. you're so fast wards don't matter it's too late once they saw they overextended or you got tanky enough turrets don't mean jack, although I'll cut you A Little break since you don't play jungle obviously, probally autofilled or someone "asked" for your main role. Anyway you were the one that caused the game to go that way, I do not see any successful ganks for bot or top at all just mid and even with their feeding mid he kept up in cs and xp unlike the perma dying top that nobody not even your mid roamed to help with you. psshu k? there literally last line of defense from them surrendering was the top laner getting super fed prob saying they can carry and 1 shot ur fed midlaner so no ff.
I don't know if you read it, but nobody dying by mistake would say "I'm gonna feed if you don't give me blue"

Why should that matter in that particular game you played? What your sup morg threatening you for it, or is it the manaless katarina and riven that already should not need any more cdr by that point in the game because they typically "supposedly" already reach it or don't need it,

Basically if it was any of those 3 telling you that, they are legit blaming you with the jungler's fault scenario that you don't play jungle gud and yeah, maybe you should of just told them OK to their face and do your own thing baiting them that you're going to help but nah, instead of being on a leash dragging the game around for wayyy too long, this game is suppose to be over by champ select, first 10-20 mins because of how snowbally 1st turret, 1 shot mcgee bot rushing is, you shoulda focused on bot for future preferences because of all their items being dirt cheaper now, twitch woulda easily got multiple quads and pentas from a mile away spray and pray bb he would of been an excellent partner for you  to gank and help the other lanes because he can sneak up on them like the stinkrat he is causing them to legit surrender from annoying shenanigans, but no, you picked wrong

Back on topic pardon me, you never Ever, you should already know  since it's a "meme" feed saying from the past, not let em have what they want, because those type of people can single handly, from everyone's personal experience when they didn't give in to the demanders ransom, completely  made the situation much worse for you, because they are having a short temper, bad games, ticking timebomb sensitive  punish themselves ego, and will do everything to bring you down. You did not mention that particular saying in your post, I did not read it cause of that and yet you may or may have not forgo it so you don't get bombarded in hates and disapproval of your post that you shoulda known better not to mess with the wrong fool, fool.   You coulda had the guy rotated to another lane helping them/ganking with you/ letting you last hit the jungle minions as they are your jg sup, dodged the champ select,ignored and reported, but no you prob said 1 negativity word back and got punished right?
Listen I don't know if this is some copy pasta meme or what, but I'm really not looking for a troll on my post. Thanks fam.

??? I'm not looking for an arrogant guy who can't understand that saying in the past, it's basic connotation  that in all aspects of life, when one who holds hostage doesn't get what they want, things go south, aka they shoot em, that's what you let happen, you basically told them "Do it pussy, I bet you won't", by ignoring their ransom and you tested them, woke up with a horse head in your sheets and got a big fat L smeared across your cheeks. If you can't understand such consequences, then honestly, the right thing for me to do is to leave since there's no saving you, wish you best of luck on endeavors, I'm out.
